project_name.justification: The project is explicitly named in the document title and body: 'Strategic US Antimony Acquisition, Coyote Creek' and 'the Coyote Creek Antimony Project in Utah, USA.'

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified as 'EV Resources Limited (ASX:EVR) (“EVR” or “the Company")'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The contact information lists 'Hugh Callaghan Managing Director'.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text states EVR is acquiring the claims that constitute the project, implying 100% ownership of the acquired assets: 'EVR is acquiring 49 unpatented claims (covering 980 acres) from a private investor based in the USA.'

primary_commodity.justification: The document repeatedly refers to the project as an antimony project, for example: 'Strategic US Antimony Acquisition, Coyote Creek' and 'The Coyote Creek Antimony Project'.

verified_article_link.justification: No article link was provided in the source documents.

currency.justification: The largest component of the acquisition consideration is denominated in Australian Dollars: 'the issuance of A$125,000 payable in EVR shares'.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The acquisition terms include a cash payment denominated in US dollars: 'Refund of fees paid by the investor to the Bureau of Land Management and Garfield County (approx. USD16,000)'.

share_payments_raw.justification: The acquisition terms include a payment in shares valued at A$125,000: 'the issuance of A$125,000 payable in EVR shares'.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Explicit cash and share payment values were provided, so this field is not applicable per the financial data extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: Per the financial data extraction hierarchy, this field is null because explicit payment values were provided. The number of shares is also not fixed, with only a maximum stated: 'a maximum of 25m shares'.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the acquisition terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of the acquisition terms.

issued_share_price.justification: Per the financial data extraction hierarchy, this field is null because explicit payment values were provided. The share price is also not a fixed value, but based on a future VWAP: 'payable in EVR shares at a 30-day VWAP'.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment defined by a specific meterage was mentioned in the document.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The document states that the work program will be funded from internal capital but does not specify a committed monetary value: 'The programme will be funded from internal sources of capital.'

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or equivalent was mentioned as part of the acquisition terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text specifies the area covered by the acquired claims: 'EVR is acquiring 49 unpatented claims (covering 980 acres)'.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the coverage area is explicitly stated: 'EVR is acquiring 49 unpatented claims (covering 980 acres)'.

resource_size.justification: A historical resource estimate is provided: 'The project at Coyote Creek was estimated to contain a resource of 12.7 million metric tonnes) at 0.79% Antimony (Utah Geological and Mineral Survey, 1975).'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are explicitly stated in the document: 'EV Resources Limited (ASX:EVR)'.
